attributes.action: Make Benwas uncle Wole and Becketts Birthday a National Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Benwa was born on the 8th, Uncle Wole on the 20th and Beckett on the 15th of September 1975.  We 3 feel that there 3 dates should be commemorated by public holidays that will be termed the great Trio break.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
